Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/Rel: Even I need to relax at the end of the day. Helps keep me sharp.
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/ade: Adeline and I don't talk much on our work dates, but it's just nice to have the company. And I can occasionally offer her some advice... there's a lot on that young lady's shoulders.
Adeline's got big plans for rebuilding Mistria, and we can all be a part of it. Especially you, [Ari].
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/adv: I know Dell, I know... they're not sandwiches, they're "adventuring rations".
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/bal: Best not to wait on balancing the books.
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/bat: I'm so happy Juniper opened up her bathhouse. I could say it's because it makes Mistria more attractive to visitors, but honestly?
My back was so cramped after a day hunched over the accounting... thank goodness Juniper opened up the bath house.
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/boo: I appreciate everything you've done for the town, [Ari]! It's been such a boon to have a farmer just down the road.
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/bre: I know better than to balance the books before I've eaten.
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/bus: It's been busy today! I guess everyone's getting ready for Inn night.
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/cro: Sounds like there's going to be a bit of a crowd at the Inn tonight, [Ari]. Hope to see you there!
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/del: Dell, if you can't reach a shelf just ask me, okay?
Dell was awake when I got up... she wasn't up all night, was she?
I don't know what Holt's worried about, Dell's a heavy sleeper. She always sleeps through when it's time to stock the shelves in the morning.
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/ear: A morning bath wakes me right up!
I'm so glad I got to sneak a bath in before my shift!
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/eve: We've got sugar, flour and rice... everything you need to jump into cooking!
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/fee: I can't remember when my feet started aching after a long day at the shop. The years do catch up.
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/gre: I'm Nora, I run the $General Store$ in town with my husband and our daughters.
I'm also head of the Chamber of Commerce and the $Saturday Market$...
Though unfortunately the $Saturday Market$ has been on hiatus since the earthquake caused the $bridge into town to collapse$.
Balor is currently the only merchant that even attempts the trip these days. And he has to do it all on foot.
Broken bridge? I think I can help!
Oh, right! Adeline did mention you'd be helping the town in exchange for the farm.
If the $broken bridge$ were repaired, all sorts of merchants could resume bringing their wares to town on Saturdays. You'd love it!
It used to be a weekly event in Mistria... All sorts of traveling merchants from around the Kingdom would stop here to sell their wares.
If the $broken bridge$ gets repaired, the $Saturday Market$ could resume. You'd love it!
Anyway, if you need anything in the way of seeds and supplies, please stop by the store any time.
Ah, you must be [Ari]! Welcome to Mistria.
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/hea: Sales always go down during a heat wave.
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/hol: I'm lucky Holt and Celine are willing to help with the store, great for all of our overheads!
Holt's not so good with spicy food...
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/hop: Hope I'll see you at the general store today, [Ari].
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/inn: No one does dinner like the Sleeping Dragon!
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/is_: Hmm, the balances don't match... I wonder if Holt's having himself a snack from the shop's inventory again...
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/lea: You can leave your tesserae by the till! And if you need help with something, just flag one of us down.
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/lif: The general store is part of the lifeblood of Mistria. That's what gets me up in the morning.
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/man: If these three ever want to start a band, I'd be first in line to be their manager!
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/mer: A good merchant looks at the world as a series of opportunities. That's good advice for a farmer too, [Ari]!
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/min: It's my day to mind the shop, [Ari]! Thanks for coming by, it's always nice to see a friendly face.
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/mor: Morning, [Ari]! Hope you're keeping busy on this fine day.
Josephine's right! A morning bath is just the thing!
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/not: Actually, Celine taught me how to make a salad. Hm.
I'm not quite the cook that Holt is, but I can make a fresh salad at least!
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/num: The numbers are looking good, Holt. It's an uptick from last month.
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/owe: I owe Josie some gossip... she always wants the latest on the Saturday Market.
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/pen: I hope Dell hasn't requisitioned it for the Dragonguard... again...
Now where did I put my pencil?
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/qui: The day after a Saturday Market always feels a bit slow by comparison.
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/rai: The house looks extra cozy on rainy days...
Unless I'm chasing Dell out of puddles.
Rain usually means it's slow at the general store, so I take the day to run some errands.
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/rea: Everything's looking good for the Market tomorrow! Now I can enjoy Inn night without any worries.
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/reg: Welcome, [Ari]! Have a look around and let me know if you have any questions.
Are you looking for Celine? She took a different shift this week.
Take your time, I'm happy to help when you're ready.
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/res: We just restocked, [Ari]! Have a good look around.
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/sat: I just had an idea for the Saturday Market, but it'll have to wait till after my shift is over.
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/she: An organized shelf is a happy shelf!
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/shi: Balor's always bringing us produce you shipped! Thanks for your hard work, [Ari].
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/ski: Hahaha, [Ari]... my husband, I can't take it. I told him I was going to skip breakfast, and you know what he said?
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/so_: I think you could drive the economy of Mistria singlehandedly, [Ari]. I've never seen one person go through so much tesserae.
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/sto: Oh, I do so love the look of a properly restocked shelf.
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/sun: I'm still recovering from yesterday's Market Day, but I'm already planning for next week!
Sales go up when the sun's out.
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/swe: A tidy store really puts my mind at ease.
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/tha: Thanks for your patronage, [Ari]. Let me know if you need anything.
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/tid: Oh, don't mind me, just tidying up while Celine is out. Can you believe she dusts the plants?
Celine's very busy this week, so I thought I'd drop by and tidy up for her.
Maybe I'll just tidy up a little bit.
Oh hey, [Ari]! I thought I'd check on Celine, but she's not here.
I thought I'd come by and tidy up, but she keeps the place pretty clean! That's my girl.
Oh, were you looking for Celine? She's out.
Celine keeps her place pretty clean! I don't know if I need to be tidying up for her anymore.
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/tig: That Balor is tight-lipped about his suppliers, but I'll crack him yet.
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/til: I can ring you up whenever you're ready.
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/too: You know you've had too much wine when you're not the least bit hungry by the time dinner rolls around...
Jo sent me home with some stew... Reina prepared the potatoes for this, you can tell by the the blend of spices!
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/tra: After the earthquake, we had to redraw all the trade routes. We're still redrawing them, in fact.
I've got a work date with Adeline.
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/unw: It's nice to unwind with some friends, isn't it?
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/wai: Holt must be on his way over...
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/wee: Oh, [Ari]! We're so thrilled you moved to town, you're already fitting right in!
She only recently moved out to her own place, and a mother worries.
I know you've only just moved to town, but I was hoping you could keep an eye out for Celine since you're just down the road...
The shop's a little quieter on the weekends.
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/wel: Good afternoon! Feel free to browse, everything is fresh and local!
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Banked Lines/win: Our winter inventory is going well! I'm so pleased.
